title: Stylized Binoculars
toolset: Maya, Substance Painter, Marmoset Toolbag, Blender
logline: I wanted to test my 3D Skills in the shortest time possible. So this is my game ready Stylized binoculars made in 2 days only. Done highpoly, then retopo and low poly with 6.462 tris and 1 texture set in 4k res. Hand painted only in albedo map.
